english: Come on, God, there's only one God.

text: Demir bile zikrullaha dayanamadı, imana geldi
english: Even the iron couldn't resist Zikrullah, he came to believe

text: Bir de buna bak istersen ha?
english: Take a look at this, huh?
I feel sorry for the enemy he's going to have a reaper with.
He's a man of fortune, like you.
Let the voice be on those who are wronged

text: Ali'den gayri yiğit olmaz diye bilinir
english: Ali is known to be a hero.

text: Oy seni veren Allah'a kurban olayım ben
english: I'm a sacrifice to God who gave you the vote.
In the name of my ancestor, Oğuz, I will carry it with honor.

text: Av olacak hayvan mı kaldı bu kıtlıkta?
english: Is there any animal left to hunt in this famine?
It's the hunt that keeps the Alps alive.

text: Obayı diri tutacak çare bulsan iyi olacak ha
english: You'd better find a way to keep Oba alive.
He'll only come out of tomorrow's youth.

text: Kış gelmeden bu yayladan göçemezsek, hepimizin hali harap
english: If we don't get out of this plateau before winter comes, we're all devastated.

text: Ama sen bir çare biliyorum diyorsan
english: But if you think you know a way

text: söyle de biz de bilelim ha?
english: Why don't you tell us so we can know?

text: Bu mevzuları en iyi abim Gündoğdu bilir
english: My brother knows this stuff when the sun comes up.
You can talk to him if you want.

text: O zaten ser verip, sır vermez
Kırk akçe verip aldığın şey bu mu?
english: Is that what you get for 40 whites?

text: Aha, tam bu dağların olduğu yer
english: Aha, that's where the mountains are.

text: Sen şimdi sultanların, emirlerin sarayını boş ver de
english: Don't worry about the palace of the sultans, the palace of the order.

text: oba nereye göçecek ondan haber ver Gündoğdu
english: Let me know where the oba's going to go.
Your father doesn't say a word.

text: Öyle gamlı baykuş gibi tüner durur otağında
english: He's sitting in his tent like a sad owl
Tomorrow everyone will learn to be young

text: Avın sırası mı şimdi? Yarın toy var
english: Is this the time for the hunt?

text: Toy senin, av benim olsun abi
english: You're the naive one, I'm the catch man.

text: Tamam, fazla uzaklaşma Tez git, tez dön
english: Okay, don't go too far. Go on, hurry back.

text: Avda seni aç bırakmayız, merak etme
english: We won't starve you on the hunt, don't worry.

text: Ava çıkıp da aç kalana yiğit mi denir Turgut?
english: Is a man who hunts and is hungry called a hero, Turgut?
Let our souls be dull on the way.
Woe to us if we were to dull you!
If you violate your honor, your honor
Your death is not from the enemy.
I hope you had a good trip.

text: Yemekten önce biraz dinlenmek ister misiniz?
english: Would you like to rest a bit before dinner?

text: Elenora dinlensin Bizim işimiz var komutan
english: Let Elenora rest. We have work to do, Commander.
What's the status of the prisoners?

text: Numan ve ailesini Kara Toygar'a teslim edecekler
english: They'll turn Numan and his family over to Black Toygar.
I waited for you for the others.
Where are they taking us, Dad?

text: Orada özgür olacağız değil mi o vakit?
english: We'll be free there, won't we?
That's how we're destined to return to Iconia.

text: Doğduğumuz, büyüdüğümüz saray da amcamın elinde demek
english: My uncle has the palace where we were born, where we grew up.

text: Sana da, kardeşine de bir şey olmasına izin vermeyeceğim kızım
english: I'm not gonna let anything happen to you or your brother, girl.

text: Bu hamleyle Kara Toygar'ı iyice kendimize bağlamış oluruz
english: With this move, we'll have Black Toygar all tied to us.

text: Onun Sultan Alaaddin'in gözüne girmesi çok önemli
english: It's very important for him to be in Sultan Aladdin's favor.

text: Kara Toygar'ın Selçuklu sarayında üst düzey vazife alması
english: Black Toygar's high-ranking role in Seljuk's palace
It'll give us a breath of fresh air.

text: İstediğiniz gibi her şeyi hallettik efendim
english: We've done everything you asked, sir.
They're on the move all the time.

text: En büyük aşiret hangisi? Kayılar komutanım
Bu yıl vergilerini daha erken ödesin o vakit
english: Let him pay his taxes earlier this year.

text: Derhal yöredeki tüm aşiretlere haber salın
english: Send word to all the local tribes immediately.

text: Haçlı Seferi öncesi Selçuklunun gücünü kırmalıyız
english: We must break the power of Seljuk before the Crusade.

text: Selçuklu sarayına daha çok adam yerleştirmelisin Titus
english: You should put more men in your Seljuk palace, Titus.

text: Tüm sarayı ele geçireceğimizden emin olun
english: Make sure we get the whole palace.
A group in the papal community.

text: Tüm Avrupa'yı harekete geçirecek bir plan hazırlamalıyız
english: We need to come up with a plan to move the whole of Europe.
That's why we have to provoke the Muslims.
We've got to pull it over.
I've got some very valuable prisoners.

text: Bizi bir an önce ulaştır da
english: Get us there as soon as you can.

text: Ölmeyi bu kadar çabuk istiyorsun ha?
english: You want to die so soon, huh?

text: Şu güzel kızınla genç şehzadene acırım
english: I feel sorry for your beautiful daughter and your young prince.

text: Bizim için kendini bu kadar üzme
english: Don't make yourself so sad for us.
You were going to be the Seljuk Sultan.
We were just gonna move on.

text: Siz bana Papa'nın kölesi olmayı teklif ettiniz
english: You offered to be the Pope's slave.

text: ve yeni bir dünya düzeni sunduk
english: And we presented a new world order.
The blood of Muslims will always be shed
You're not gonna get away with this.
We will shed your blood with our Muslim friends
We'll see how it turns out.
By the way, to the men I sent to hell,
Say hi to Bisol for me, will you?
I brought you some water. Here.

text: Çabuk kardeşini al ve gidin buradan Olmaz! Olmaz!
english: Get your brother and get out of here!
Help me, help me, help me!
We need to stop the blood.
The first crusaders fell to his fate.

text: Başarırsak, tüm bu coğrafyanın sınırları değişecek
english: If we succeed, the boundaries of all this geography will change.
For the salvation of our Jerusalem
We must not hesitate to spend the wealth of our cult.

text: Genç erkekler için yeni bir Kudüs seferi
english: A new Jerusalem campaign for young men
It's the easiest way to get rich.

text: Haçlı ordusunun bir neferi olabilmek için
english: To become a guardian of the Crusader army
They're going to march into the army.

text: hepsi bu karnaval için yanıp tutuşacaklar
english: They'll all be dying for this carnival.
While Muslims are at each other's throats

text: bu kez işimiz zor olmayacak Titus
english: It won't be hard this time, Titus.

text: Sultan Alaaddin'in hükümdarlığında en parlak günlerini yaşıyor
english: Sultan is having his prime in Aladdin's reign.

text: Türklerle Selahaddin Eyyubi'nin torunlarını birbirine düşürdüğümüz gün
english: The day we turned the Turks against the descendants of Saladin Eyyubi
The jackals have already smelled blood.

text: Bir alay haçlıyı tepelemek kolay Hadi bakalım
english: It's easy to take down a bunch of crusaders. Come on.
What do you do for a woman?
I said we're not coming, man!

text: Burada kara gündeki ak akçe bitmiştir Afşin kardeşim
english: It's the white end of the black day here, brother Afshin.
We've been looking for jobs, and they're slow.
We'll be on our way in no time.
You've brought the Safas to the Kai Obama

text: Bu bozkır adamı dirimi tutar ki Gazanfer, biz de diri olalım?
english: Does this steppe keep the man alive, Gazanfer, so we can be alive?
You're all right. You're all right.
The caravan is at the bottom of the Black Mother-in-law

text: göç olmadan bir eksiği kalmasın dedim
english: I wanted to make sure there was nothing missing without immigration.
I hope you find what you hope for.

text: Süleyman Şah'ı müsaitse ziyaret etmek isterim
english: I'd like to visit Solomon Shah if he's available.

text: Beyimize Gazanfer Ağa'nın geldiğini haber verin
english: Inform our master that Gazanfer Agha has arrived.

text: O dilsiz beyim, ben yardımcı olayım
english: He's a mute, let me help you.
My first visit to Obana, sir.
You must have thought it was someone else.

text: şu gözlerim sizi bir daha gördü ya
english: Those eyes of mine saw you again.
Please accept my gifts, my lord.
I brought these for you from Konstantinapol.
Hand these out to those in need

text: Anlat bakalım, o gözler başka diyarlarda neler gördü?
english: Tell me, what did those eyes see in other lands?
I'd be deaf. I'd be deaf.

text: Gözlerim oyulaydı da görmez olaydım beyim
english: My eyes were hollowed out and I couldn't see, sir.

text: Ancak kaçak şehzadelerin başına iş açmasından korkar
english: But he's afraid that runaway princes will get into trouble.
All Orthodox people are leaving the city.
He was in it, we heard about it.
It's obvious they're up to something again.
What's the status of the hungry?

text: Aç karınlarını doyurmak için yine yollara düşeceklermiş
english: They'll be back on the road to feed their hungry bellies.

text: Papazın Avrupa'daki prensleri Haçlı Seferleri için çağrıda bulunduğu söylenir beyim
english: It is said that the priest is calling for Princes of Europe's Crusades, sir.

text: Biz Müslümanlar da birbirimize kılıç çekelim
english: We Muslims draw swords at each other.
Let's put a wedge between us.
Let's fuel the flames of temptation
From Anatolia to Basra, fire everywhere.

text: Bu ateş bizi de vuracak beyim
english: This fire will shoot us too, sir.

text: Aman ateş demeyin fena oluyorum beyim
Mallarımı obada satmak için sizden destur almaya gelmiştim beyim
english: I've come to buy from you to sell my goods on the Obada, sir.

text: Türkmen göçerleri hizaya sokmak için bölgeye gelmiş
english: Turkmen has come to the region to align the nomads
So we're gonna have a tough time
This girl is from Venice, Rozalina.

text: Böylesi hem senin hem benim için bulunmaz fırsat
english: This is the perfect opportunity for you and me.

text: Tazelik ve güzellik fışkırıyor her yerinden
english: There's freshness and beauty gushing out of you

I must say you have great taste, Commander.

They brought him in by ship, he's a Serb.
He's good at men's service. Cut it out!
You don't have to be afraid of me.

text: Turgut'um neler oldu? Merak edecek bir şey yok

english: Hamza, keep an eye on him.
What's going on? Who are they?

text: Ah, kaburganın altına gelmiş kılıç darbesi
english: Ah, a sword blow under the rib.

text: hemen sıcak su getir Hemen Akçakoca
english: Get me some hot water right now, white husband.

text: Ama biz önce şu yarayı halledelim
english: But let's take care of this wound first.
The Akça husband will take it from here.
Let's not leave my father alone, sister.
God has brought you before us.
We've been a pain in the ass.
You're gonna take your breath away

text: Esir pazarında satacaklardı herhalde Babam tüccardır
english: They were going to sell it in the slave market. My father's a merchant.
We've been captured in the Mediterranean

text: Sizi bu kadar haçlı götürdüğüne göre
english: Since it takes you so many crusaders

text: Ben obanın beyi, Süleyman Şah'ın oğluyum
english: I am the master of Oban, the son of Süleyman Shah.

I'll buy you and set you free
Once you calm down, shut up!
Don't let me kill you, too.
Sir, forgive me for my children.
Get ready, we're on our way.

text: Hadi oğlum, sen de gel sofraya
english: Come on, boy. Come to the table.
Let me finish this, I'm coming, ma'am.

text: Her daim böyle ol aslan parçası

english: Don't get involved until you're done.
Bring the syrup, girl. I'll get it.
He went to look for the shepherds. He'll be back.
Put another plate on the table.

text: Bir gün geri gelirse sofrada yeri olduğunu bilsin çocuk
english: If he comes back one day, he'll know he's at the table.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Ee evlat, yine büyük bir avla dönmüşsün
english: Well, boy, you're back with a big catch.

text: Ovanın ortasında yıldırım çeken ağaç gibisin
english: You're like a tree in the middle of the plain with a bolt of lightning.
You're attracting all kinds of trouble.
They've been captured by the Crusaders.
He must be of the Earl of Antioch, my lord.

text: böyle ellerini kollarını sallaya sallaya esir taşımazlar
english: They don't carry prisoners with their hands in their arms.
...Seljutsu must have known about these prisoners.
There were no Seljuk soldiers in them.

text: Nasıl bir belaya bulaştığın er ya da geç ayyuka çıkacak Ertuğrul
english: Whatever trouble you're in, sooner or later it's gonna come to light, Ertugrul.

text: Ne yapsaydım abi? Onları öylece bıraksa mıydım?
english: What was I supposed to do, leave them just like that?

text: Onları Kayılara yaraşır bir şekilde ağırlayın
english: Give them a proper reception for the apricots.
It's okay, you're gonna be okay.

text: Bir ihtiyacınız var mı diye sorayım dedim
english: I just wanted to see if you needed anything.
We've already been too much of a burden on you.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

text: Bamsı Beyrek’le Doğan çadırlarını sizin için hazırlıyorlar
english: They're preparing their tent for you.
You'll stay there for the night.

text: Ben babamın yanında kalsam daha iyi
english: I'd rather stay with my father.

text: Bu gece biraz dinlenin Çok perişan görünüyorsunuz
english: Get some rest tonight. You look miserable.

text: Baban yarın uyandığında size daha çok ihtiyacı olacak
english: When your father wakes up tomorrow, he'll need you more.

text: Merak etme, babanın yanında ben kalırım
english: Don't worry, I'll stay with your father.

text: Bunca zaman nasıl büyüttün bu çıbanı sırtında?
english: How did you grow this boil on your back all this time?

text: Biz ne çıbanlar büyüttük sırtımızda Hayme
english: What boils did we grow on our backs, Hayme?
Are we afraid of this poor man's betrayal?

text: Ama en başında ezseydin başını bu belanın, şimdi çoktan…
english: But if you'd run over this mess in the first place, you'd already be...

text: Çakallar eskiden dağlardaydı Şimdi obamıza kadar indiler
english: The coyotes used to be in the mountains. Now they're down to our obama.

text: En ufak bir hatamda üzerime çullanmak için beklerler
english: If I make the slightest mistake, they wait to jump on me.
I hide it so they don't see my weakness.
I'd rather talk to them than...
...silent and scorched by my pain is the eldest son.
You could've at least told Akça husband.

text: Bana şifa olacak bir merhem hazırlıyor
english: He's making me a healing ointment.
We'll ride it out in the evening.
What's the matter, thinking about our guests?

text: Bu fitilin ucu hangi isli kandili yakmıştır Hayme?
english: Which well-lit lamp did the tip of this fuse light, Hayme?

text: Aman Allah’ım! Sanki saraylı bir melike gibi oldun Halime
english: Oh, my God, you're like a palace angel.
It's weird that you just said that.
Turgut Alp bought this for me.

text: Hay Allah Niye verdin ki şimdi bunu bana?
english: Jesus Christ, why did you give it to me?
Because I knew it would look great on you.
And it looks good on you.
When we're off this plateau, I hope.

text: Aykız, zor değil mi böyle bir Alp'in karısı olmak?
english: Isn't it hard being the wife of such an Alps?

text: Yüreği her an benim için atıyorsa zorluğun ne önemi var?
english: What does it matter if his heart is beating for me all the time?

text: Sağ salim odasına dönsün başka bir şey istemem
english: I don't want him back in his room safe or anything else.
Just as long as there's no death.

text: Gel bu saçlarını da örelim istersen, he?

english: After my mother died, I was a mother to the brave...

text: …babama yoldaşlık etmekten başka bir şey olmadı hayatımda
english: I've been nothing but a friend to my father.

text: Hem zaten hangi erkek benim gibi…
english: Besides, who's a man like me...

text: En son ne zaman bir aynada kendine baktın sen?
english: When was the last time you looked at yourself in a mirror?

text: Titus gavurunun kardeşi değil mi bu?
english: Isn't that Titus the infidel's brother?
Send these carcasses to the Templars
Here, load this on the horse.
Which tribe of yours is this brand?

text: O çoban başı, Selçuklu’ya kafa mı tutacak?
english: Will that shepherd's head stand up to Seljuk?

text: Allah şifa versin de başımıza bela olmasın yeter
english: May God heal us and we won't be in trouble.
I'll be with you in a minute.

text: Babam iyi mi Ertuğrul Bey? İyi. Çok iyi
english: Is my father all right, Mr. Ertugrul?

text: İçeriye girince sen de görürsün Ateşi düştü
english: When you get inside, you'll see his fever's gone.

text: Gördün mü kızı şimdiden avucunun içine almış Ertuğrul’u
english: See, he's already got her in his hand, Ertugrul.
From now on, it's in your dreams.

text: Yıllar var ki hiç bu kadar güzel uyumamıştım
english: It's been years since I've slept so well.
In the woods, you called me Templars.

text: Kudüs’ün intikamını almaktan başka bir şey bilmezler
english: They know nothing but to avenge Jerusalem

text: Bu kadar güçlülerse sizden ne istiyorlar?
english: If they're so strong, what do they want from you?

text: Selçuklu’yla aranızda bir mesele mi var Halime?
english: Do you have a problem with Seljuk, Halima?

text: Koca Selçuklu’nun bizimle ne işi olur ki?
english: What's Big Seljuk doing with us?

text: Haa, ama sen yine de dilinin altındaki baklayı çıkar istersen he?

text: Bir şeyi çok isteyince olmuyormuş baba
english: It doesn't work when you want something so bad, Dad.

...we went through the motions of migratory.
In winter, it's just a matter of time

text: Anlaşıldı. Senin de canın rahmetli anan kadar tezmiş
english: You're as quick as your late mother.

text: Bre bir bak bakalım şu ulu dağın yaylasında kış geçer mi?
english: Bre, see if winter will pass on this great mountain plateau.

text: Bütün beyler akın akın Süleyman Şah’ımızın otağına niye geliyor?
english: Why do all the men flock to the tent of Solomon Shah?

text: Oturacağız, konuşacağız bu meseleyi çözeceğiz inşallah
english: We're gonna sit down, we're gonna talk, we're gonna figure this out, I hope.

In the name of Allah, we'll take care of it.

So what do you have in mind?

text: Süleyman Şah mecalsizdir Bir ata bile sahip çıkamaz

♪ Ride, ride, ride, ride, ride with a sword ♪

text: Ne istiyorsan söyle ben alıp getireyim sana ana
english: Tell me what you want and I'll get it for you, Mother.
I'm so glad. May God heal him.
Our stove is always open to you

text: Bir derdin olursa hiç çekinme gel söyle Tamam mı?
english: If you have any problems, don't hesitate to tell me, okay?

text: Allah sizden razı olsun Hayme Hanım
Ne yerde, ne gökte… Halis bir müminin gönlünde olan biri var…
english: There is not a soul in the heavens or on the earth, but is in the heart of a pure believer.

text: …varı bir eden Rahman ve Rahim olan Allah’ın adıyla
english: In the name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful,
Between the blue sky and the dry earth.
...our bloodline, our height, our obas, our stove, our sons, our daughters...

text: …adalet dağıtan beyimizin huzurunda toyumuz kutlu olsun
english: ...in the presence of our righteous gentleman.

text: …gönüllerimizi imanla dolduran yüce Allah’ın doksan dokuz adıyla…
english: ...in the name of the great God who filled our hearts with faith...

text: Çok şükür ki malları yola çıkarmadan önce obamıza bir tüccar geldi
english: Thankfully, a merchant came to our cabin before we could get the goods on the road.

text: Derim ki malları değerince tüccara satalım
english: I say we sell the goods to the merchant when they're worth it.

text: Böylelikle yol masraflarından da kurtulmuş oluruz
english: That way we can get rid of the road expenses.

text: Tek derdimiz mal olsa iyi beyim
english: If it's all we care about, sir.

text: Civar ovalarda hayvanlarımızı otlatacağımız mera kalmadı
english: We're running out of cattle to graze in the surrounding plains.

text: Su içemez, süt veremez oldular Açlıktan telef oldular
english: They can't drink water, they can't give milk, they're starving.

text: Tez vakitte bir hâl çaresi bulmamız gerek
english: We've got to find a way out of this fast.
I'll see what the Oban looks like.

text: Tüm civar beylere haber saldık yurt istedik
english: We've sent word to all the local gentlemen. We've asked for a dorm.

text: Bir de Moğol eşkıyasından kaçan Türkmen boyları her bir tarafa dağılmış
english: And the Turkishmen who escaped from the Mongol bandits scattered all over the place.

text: Ne yapalım? Otlak için kardeşlerimize kılıç mı çekelim?
english: What do you want us to do, draw a sword on our brothers for the pasture?

text: Allah’ın rahmet hazinesi mi kesik beyim?
english: Is the treasure of God's mercy cut, my lord?
We've been waiting here for months.

text: Bir çare bulamamaktayız Ne zamandır Kayı, böyle çaresiz kalmıştır?
english: Since when has Kayi been so desperate that we can't find a cure?
Don't we have dorms to go to?

text: Bir hâl çare bulmazsak eğer obayı nasıl tutarız ayakta?
english: If we don't find a cure, how do we hold the oba?

text: Ya ne zamandır El Rezzak olan Allah, unutulur olur?
english: And how long has it been since God, who is El Rezzak, will be forgotten?

text: Bizim mayamız sabırla yoğrulmuştur Gökten ne iner, bize de o düşer
english: Our yeast endures patiently, and it descends not from the sky, nor to us.

text: Biz sabrın ne olduğunu yurtsuz gezerek öğrendik Deli Demir
english: We learnt what patience is by traveling without a home Crazy Iron
Don't let the other generation be homeless
Don't tell us what patience is.

text: Ben ne vakit sizi çıplak bıraktım aç bıraktım ki…
english: When have I ever left you naked and hungry...
...you'd be so worried about the food?

text: Beyim, sen bizi ne aç bıraktın ne de çıplak
english: Lord, you didn't leave us hungry or naked

text: Lakin biz de seni ne ersiz bıraktık ne de pusatsız
english: But we didn't spare you, nor did we spare you.
...let's find a new home and emigrate.

text: Ak koyunların can bulacağı her yere
english: Where the white sheep will die

text: Ata topraklarımıza göç edelim Moğol eşkıyasının da gücü kırılmış derler
english: They say the Mongol bandit's power is broken.
Anyone who says it's a lie.

text: Moğol eşkıyası aç kurt gibi canavarlaşmış
english: The Mongol bandit has become a beast like a hungry wolf.

text: Hiç mi bir çare düşünmedik beyim?
english: Didn't we ever think of a cure, sir?

text: Duydum ki Halep Emiri El Aziz
english: I've heard that Aleppo Emir El Aziz
He was gathering forces against the Crusaders.

text: Ben derim ki El Aziz’e bir elçi gönderelim
english: I say we send a messenger to El Aziz.

text: Desin ki sen bize oba ver biz de sana pusatlı er verelim
english: Let him say you give us the oba, and we'll give you the pusatian.

text: Hem böylece Haçlı ordularıyla savaşır cenk eder gazi oluruz…
english: Then we'll fight the Crusaders and become veterans...

text: Ne zamandır ben söylemeden harekete geçilir oldu?
english: Since when do you take action without me saying so?
Do you accept the idea of the sunrise, Aghas?
I hope it works out for you.

text: Peki elçi olarak kim gidecek beyim?
english: And who will go as ambassador, my lord?

text: Süleyman Şah, obandaki densizler şerefimizi iki paralık ettiler
english: Suleiman Shah, the viles of the Obhan have dishonored us.

text: Obama yurt veren bir sultanın şerefi benim de şerefimdir Kara Toygar
english: Obama is my honor as well as a sultan who gives his country home to Black Toygar.
What have we done, Sultan Aladdin?

text: ve de komutanının şerefini iki paralık etmişizdir?
english: And we've dishonored his commanding officer?

text: Bu balta öldürdüğünüz adamın sırtından çıktı
english: This axe came from the back of the man you killed.
Is that where you left the axe?

text: Elçi olarak gelen birliğe pusu atıp şövalyelerini katletmişsiniz
english: You ambushed and slaughtered his knights as ambassadors.
And I don't want to just...
You kidnapped the three prisoners the unit brought to the Sultan.

text: Töremizi bilmez gibi konuşursun Kara Toygar
english: You speak as if you don't know our manners, Black Toygar.

text: Obamıza gelen misafiri teslim etmeyiz Hele ki yaralıysa
english: We don't deliver guests to our Oba, especially if they're injured.
I'm here to represent the Seljuk Sultan.

text: Sultanın emrine nasıl uyulursa benim de sözüme öyle uyulur
english: My word is obeyed, just as the Sultan's orders are obeyed.

text: Aksi hâlde neler olacağını bilirsin Süleyman Şah
english: You know what will happen if you don't, Suleyman Shah.

text: Biz töremizle yaşar töremizle ölürüz Kara Toygar
english: We live by tradition, we die by tradition, Black Toygar.
We know the sultan is a man of state.

text: Ama önce atam Oğuz’un töresi der tahtına öyle kurulur
english: But first the custom of my ancestor Oğuz.. ..is built on his throne.
A man who doesn't know manners can't be a sultan.

text: Adam olmayanla da bizim işimiz olmaz
english: We don't care who's not a man.

text: Koca Selçuklu’nun bir komutanı olarak bunu bilmen gerekir
english: As a commander of the Great Seljuk, you should know that.
I've told you my last word.
Let's go, let's go, let's go.
We asked you with our literature, Süleyman Shah.

text: Sen vermezsen biz gelip almasını biliriz
english: If you don't give it to him, we'll let him come and get it.

text: Selçuklu’yu karşına alma Yoksa başınıza neler geleceğini bilirsin
english: Don't confront Seljuk, or you'll know what's going to happen to you.

text: Ne yaptığını bilmeyecek kadar kocadı artık
english: He was too old to know what he was doing.
I told you he'd smell soon.
Leader of Seljuk Sultan Aladdin Keykabat.

text: Şimdi tüm İslam dünyası intikam peşine düşsün bakalım
english: Now let the whole Islamic world seek revenge.
They were ambushed when they brought in the prisoners.

text: Ama kim olduğunu biz de bilmiyoruz
english: But we don't know who he is.
You're the one who got us into this mess.

text: Kafanın dikine dikine gitmekten ne zaman vazgeçeceksin sen?
english: When are you going to stop going straight ahead?

text: He? Hiç kimse umurunda değil Ne baban, ne oban!
Sen olsaydın ne yapardın? He? Sen olsaydın ne yapardın?
english: What would you do if it were you?

text: Onları öylece bırakıp çekip gider miydin?
english: Would you just walk away from them?

text: Benim tanıdığım Gündoğdu öyle bir adam değildir
english: The sunrise I know is not that kind of man.

text: Benim tanıdığım Gündoğdu adaleti de insafı da çiğnemez
english: The sunrise I know doesn't violate justice or mercy.

text: Şu obanın hâline bir bak Çatır çatır çatırdıyor!
english: Look at the way this obama's cracking!

text: Kış kapıda Nereye göçeceğimiz belli değil
english: Winter's at the door We don't know where we're going
Open your eyes, open your eyes!
Right in the middle of the ball...

text: …oba için hayati meseleler konuşulurken şu yaptıklarına bir bak
english: Look at what you've done as vital matters are being discussed for the Oba.

text: Bu oba nasıl ayakta kalacak Ertuğrul? Nasıl?
english: How will this oba survive, Ertugrul?

text: Bu koca dünya kime kaldı ki bize kalsın Aktolgalı
english: Who's got this big world left to us, Aktolgalı?

text: Bu yalan dünyada niye yaşamalı insan?
english: Why should you live in this world of lies?
Why should he wear a sword?
Why should he have a dorm?

text: Devletmiş, töreymiş, yurtmuş… Niye varlar he?
english: Governments, customs, dorms... why do they exist?

text: Zalim, adam vermezsek gök kubbeyi başımıza yıkacakmış
english: Cruel, if we don't give him a man, he'll bring the sky down on us.

text: Eğer verirsek gök kubbe başımıza yıkılmaz mı?
english: Won't the sky fall on our heads if we give it to him?
If I don't give it to him, he's gonna get in trouble.

text: Bir nefesine bile hükmedemediğimiz bu dünya için…
english: For this world where we can't even hold a breath...
Do we say good-bye to the tyrant?
Then won't the custom shut up?
Then won't our stove go out?

text: Kara Toygar tam bir zalim her türlü kötülüğü yapacaktır
english: Black Toygar is a total tyrant. He will do all kinds of evil.
As you've shown everyone your intelligence...

text: …vakti geldiğinde kimin bey olacağını da gösterdin
english: When the time came, you showed me who was going to be a gentleman.
We must get rid of the trouble of Black Toygar

text: Babam töre dedi mi geri adım atmaz
english: When my father says it's a tradition, he doesn't back down.
Look at the trouble you've caused us
We have to convince my father.

text: Onu ikna edersek Ertuğrul da dize gelecektir
english: If we convince him, Ertugrul will come to his knees.
You talk like you don't know your father.
If the world were to fall, he wouldn't give up his prisoners.

text: Baban beni Kara Toygar’a elçi olarak göndereceğini söyledi
english: Your father said you'd send me as a messenger to Black Toygar.

text: Hayırdır? Kötü bir şey mi oldu?

english: I wanted to talk to you about today.
Don't put the oban in danger for us.

text: Babam kendine geliyor İki güne kalmaz yol alırız
english: My dad's coming around. We'll be on our way in two days.
If all the jihan were to come together...

text: …yine de sizi o zalimlere teslim etmeyiz
english: And We will not turn you over to the wrong-doers.

text: Kara Toygar’la kanlı bıçaklı olursanız bunun vebali ağır olur
english: If you have a bloody knife with the Black Toygar, the plague will be severe.

text: Biz Kayılar her türlü zorluğa göğüs germeyi iyi biliriz
english: We Apricots know how to deal with all kinds of challenges.

text: Bir ateşe düştüm ana Hem de ne düşmek
english: ♪ I fell in a fire ♪ ♪ And what a fall ♪
I don't care if I'm the only one who falls
I put the big one on the fire.

text: Düştüğün yere vardığında böyle olacağını bilir miydin?
english: Did you know this would happen when you got to where you fell?
You're going to take on that infidel's bandit...

text: …ya o komutan bozuntusunun Haçlılarla bir olacağını bilir miydin?
english: ...or did you know that that commander would be one with the Crusaders?
Could you walk away from your cries?

text: Ne ava giderken böyle olacağını bilirdin…
english: You knew what would happen when you went hunting...

text: …ne de kendinle birlikte obayı ateşe atacağını
english: ...that you're not going to throw the obama into the fire with yourself.
You threw it in the fire.
Yeah, you threw it in the fire.

text: Ateş vardır, somunu yakar kül eder
english: There's fire, it burns its loaf
He showed me where you fell.

text: İsyan etmek ne sana ne de obadakilere düşer
english: It is not for you to rebel, nor for those on board.

text: Bu sınavda kül olmak da var, pişmek de
english: There's ash on this test, and there's cooking.
For him, and for his delusions.

text: …bu obadaki haddini bilmezlere de hiç kulak asma
english: And don't pay any attention to the presumptuous ones in this room.
Be the best of our tradition, son.
Stand firm behind your father's decisions

text: Allah seni de babamı da başımızdan eksik etmesin ana
english: May Allah keep you and my father together.

text: Hadi al şu suyu da babanın başucuna koy
english: Take this water and put it on your father's bedside.

Give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me, give me.
It should have been me instead of you.

text: Bunun sana yapanların soyu tükenene kadar savaşacağım
english: I will fight until those who did this to you are extinct.

text: Onlar toprağın dibine gidene kadar savaşacağım
english: I'll fight until they're in the ground.
Your blood won't stay on the floor, brother.
If God isn't with me for revenge...
...I'll turn my face to the demons.
I'll carry hell over the Turkmen

text: Ben ölene kadar onların gazabı olacağım
english: I'll be their wrath until I'm dead.
That's how it is, Ilyas Fakih.
I didn't know how to interpret this dream.

text: Ama dün geceden beri de içime bir ateş düştü
english: But since last night, I've had a fever.
First of all, hard times wait for us.

text: İkincisi elçinin kim olacağına dair manevi emir vardır
english: Secondly, there are spiritual commandments as to who the apostle will be.

text: İyi misin? Ağrın var mı baba?

english: I'll be all right in no time.

text: Bir ihtiyacınız olursa Yiğit bize haber verir
english: If you need anything, Hero will let us know.

text: Ertuğrul, Yiğit bana her şeyi anlattı
Sen ve seni yetiştirenler yaman insanlarmış
english: You and the people who raised you were tough.
You've got our backs, you've got our backs

text: Bu toprakların insanları töresini unutalı çok oldu
english: The people of this land have long forgotten their customs.

text: Senin gibi birine denk geldiğimiz için Allah’ın sevgili kuluymuşuz
english: Since we met someone like you, we are God's beloved servants.

text: Ben gideyim. Siz de istirahat edin

english: You'll get ready with your brother.

text: Eğer bir gün daha fazla kalırsak bu insanların hayatlarını tehlikeye sokarız
english: If we stay one more day, we'll put these people's lives in danger.

text: Tam toy önü ahır da nereden çıktı Gündoğdu?

english: I'll take care of the new horse they brought.

text: Sen de Halep için hazırlıklara başla yavaş yavaş
english: You start preparing for Aleppo slowly.

text: Ben her şeyi hazır ederim etmesine de…

english: ...Are you sure you'll go to Halep?
I'm the one who put the idea of Aleppo to shame.

text: Elçi olmak da bana düşer elbette! He?
english: Of course, it is up to me to be a messenger.

text: Öyle de, böyle de… Sabah sabah ne bu huzursuz hâller Selcan?
english: Yeah, well, what's with all the unrest in the morning, Selcan?
Is it because you're gonna go that I'm gonna get sore...

text: …babam seni göndermezse kırılırsın diye mi aklım kaçsın, bilemedim
english: I don't know if I'm going to lose my mind if my father doesn't send you away.

text: Tabii ki beni gönderecek Başka kimi gönderecek?
english: Of course he's gonna send me. Who else is he gonna send?
...if you're so upset that I'm leaving...

text: …ben gidip gelene kadar sen de beni iki canlı karşılarsın. He?
english: And you'll welcome me back with two lives until I get there.
While you were in the barn taking care of the horses...

text: …ben de burada sana yolluk hazır ederken…
english: While I'm here preparing you for the road...
...that's gonna wait longer. It's gonna be daylight.

text: Toydan sonra bakarım atlara o vakit
english: I'll take care of the horses after they're young.

text: Beyim, Süleyman Şah’ım sizi görmek istedi
english: My lord, Solomon my king has asked to see you.
I've decided to let Ertugrul go.
I have something to talk to you about.
Ertugrul, you go get ready too.
Come on, my fast Turtle, come on!

text: Hadi oradan be! Ben kazandım Çizgiyi önce ben geçtim
english: Come on, I won, I crossed the line first.

text: Hadi geç bu hileleri Önce çizgiyi ben geçtim
english: Come on, pass these tricks. I crossed the line first.

text: Aykız'ın şahitliği olmaz. Yavuklun o senin
english: Aygirl can't testify, she's your girlfriend.

text: Aa! İnsafın kurusun Bamsı Beyrek Ne vakit yalan söyledim ha?

english: I told you not to fucking do this!

text: Yaparsam ne olacak ha? Bak zaten ceviz kadar beynin var, sebebin olmayayım ha
english: Look, you've got a brain the size of a walnut, so I don't have to be your reason.

text: Cevizin kabuğu sağlam Korkma gel, gel, gel
english: Don't be afraid. Come, come, come.
Wait a minute, wait a minute.
Solomon called to the king's tent
I think he's out hunting gazelles.

text: Ceylanın da maşallahı var ama Avlanacak gibi değil
english: The gazelle's got his hands full, but it's not like he's gonna hunt.
Oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy, oh, boy.
I've had a bellyful of sitting down.

text: İlyas Fakih'e de söyleyin O da bizimle geliyor
english: Tell Ilyas Fakih he's coming with us.
I came up with the Aleppo idea.

text: El Aziz'in askere ihtiyacı olduğunu da ben söyledim
english: I also told him that El Aziz needed soldiers.

text: Niye ben değil de o baba?
İçindeki kibir putunu ne zaman büyüttün sen?
english: When did you grow up to be an idol of vanity?
We didn't even make a raid.
Because our gentleman is in trouble with a boil.

text: Bırak Allah aşkına baba. Bütün oba halkı senin yaşlılığından şikayetçi
english: For God's sake, Dad, all the obans are complaining about your old age.

text: Elçi olmanın abinin hakkı olduğunu mu düşünürsün?
english: You think your brother deserves to be an ambassador?
Why me and not my brother?

text: Taptığı iktidar ateşi ruhunu teslim aldı
english: The power fire he worshipped has surrendered his soul.
So I put out the fire.
As for the fire inside of you

text: misafirlerimiz, sen dönene kadar obada kalacaklar
english: Our guests will stay in the cabin until you return.

text: Bunu söylüyorum ki vazifeni zaafa düşürmeyesin
english: I say this so you don't weaken your duty.
Don't come back empty-handed from Aleppo.
I've put Kayi's future on your shoulders
Your failure is a disaster for all of us.
The land that El Aziz will give

text: Ama hiçbir Oğuz kurbanlık koyun değildir
english: But no Oğuz is a sacrificial lamb

text: Şunu unutma; senin Halep'te bir yurda ihtiyacın olduğu kadar
english: Just remember, as much as you need a dorm in Aleppo.

text: Halep emirinin de Kayıların savaşçılarına ihtiyacı var
english: And Aleppo's order needs the warriors of the Apricots.

text: isteğinin hakkını veren gerçek bir Oğuz olduğunu göster onlara
english: Show them that you're a real Oğuz who gives you what you want.

text: Hayatım pahasına vazifemi yerine getireceğim baba
english: I will do my duty with my life, Father.
I'll be back before I let you down.
It's daylight, it's daylight, it's daylight, it's daylight.
These are the minds of Mother Hayme.

text: Topunu yel alsın. Topunu yel alsın onların Ben yapacağımı biliyorum

english: Those who rise in anger sit in harm
For God's sake, woman, let it go.
Get your shit together, get ready with your Alps.

text: O densiz kardeşin, işleri eline yüzüne bulaştırdığı zaman
english: When that brother of yours screwed up.
The angels of death wait for the day in the room

text: İlk defa ayrılırmışız gibi konuşursun Aykız'ım
english: That's the first time you've ever talked to me like we're breaking up, my moongirl.
When did we ever get together, Turgut?

text: Baba döşeğinde yol gözlemekle koca döşeğinde er beklemek bir mi?
english: On your father's bed, watching the road, waiting on your husband's bed?
It's not the pain of separation. It's the knot in my throat.

text: Ne vakit artık evleniyoruz desek hep bir sebepten ertelenir durur
english: Every time we say we're getting married, it's always postponed for a reason.

text: Halep işi olur, olmaz bilmiyorum ama
english: I don't know if it's Aleppo or not.

text: yeni obanın ilk düğünü bizimki olacak Sana söz veriyorum
english: Ours will be the first wedding of the new Oba, I promise you.

text: Davulcular, Aykız'la Turgut nihayet evleniyorlar ey ahali diye haykıracaklar
english: The drummers, Aygirl and Turgut are finally getting married.

text: obanın en güzel kızı evleniyor, sıra bize gelecek artık diye seni gösterecekler
english: The most beautiful girl in the room is getting married, and they're gonna show you that it's our turn.

text: Sultan kızlarını bile çatlatacak güzelliğinle ayrılacaksın Deli Demir'in çadırından
english: You will leave Crazy Iron's tent with your beauty that will crack even the Sultan's daughters
I just wanted to say I'm really sorry.

text: Bilmiyorum, hangi söz bu acıya karşılık gelir?
english: I don't know, what word would respond to that pain?

text: Beni en iyi sen anlarsın Elenora

english: It was the Muslims who killed your father.

text: Yolun açık olsun Titus Dikkatli ol

english: I'll be back, Elenora. See you soon.

text: İyi bir komutanın gerçek bir tapınak şövalyesine dönüştüğüne tanık oldun Elenora
english: You've seen a good commander turn into a true Knight of the Temple, Elenora.

text: İntikam yoksa saman askerden farkı kalmaz şövalyenin
english: If there's no revenge, the knight is no better than a soldier.

text: Hediyelere bakılırsa Süleyman Şah yaptığı hatayı anlamış
english: According to the gifts, Sulaiman Shah understood his mistake.
Our master loves Seljuk and counts

text: Ama bu işi ben çözebilirim Kara Toygar
english: But I can figure this out, Black Toygar.

text: Verdiğim süre sabah olunca bitiyor Kurdoğlu
english: My deadline ends in the morning, Kurdoglu.

text: Aksi halde Selçuklunun öfkesinden bütün Kayı Obası yanar
english: Otherwise, the whole Abyssian Obama will burn out of Seljuk's rage.

text: Bizimle birlikte sen de yanarsın Kara Toygar
english: You'll burn with us, Black Toygar.

text: Sakın bana bu olanlardan Sultan'ın haberi olduğunu söyleme
english: Don't tell me Sultan knows about this.

text: Onları Süleyman Şah'tan zorla almak için elindeki asker sayısı yeterli değil
english: The number of soldiers you have is not enough to take them by force from the Shah.
You've got to get a whole army together.

text: Kayı'yı ezip geçecek kudretli ordularınızın olduğunu biliyorum
english: I know you have powerful armies that will crush Alayi.

text: Yaparsın ama önce bunlardan Sultan'ın haberi olması gerek
english: You can, but first Sultan needs to know about this.
That won't do you any good.
The truth is, we don't need it either.

text: Uzun lafın kısası; hem senin hem de obanın kazanması için
english: Long story short, for both you and the oba to win.
I need you to listen to me.
Since your goal is to cooperate

text: söyle o zaman, kim yaptı bunu?
english: Then tell me, who did this?

text: Sabah ezanıyla birlikte Halep'e yola koyulacağız
english: We'll leave for Aleppo in the morning with his prayer.

text: Biz Alpler her an, her şeye hazırız
english: We Alps are ready for anything, any moment.

text: Doğru. Alışınca kolay gelir her şey
english: That's right. lt's easy when you get used to it.
Sometimes it's hard when you get used to it.
Don't let the sun burn your skin
Don't let the rain get to you.

text: Ayağına taş değmesin Su gibi git
english: Don't let a stone touch your feet. Go like water.
Come back to me like water

text: Kuş misali uçarak götürür, tez vakitte beni geri getirir obama o zaman
english: He'll fly me like a bird, and soon he'll bring me back, Obama.
I mean, before I get back.
Your father can't pull himself together.

text: Bizim zoraki misafirler Sultan Alaaddin'in akrabaları falan mı?
english: Are our forced guests related to Sultan Aladdin or something?
It's none of your business. It's true.

text: İstediğini almak istiyorsan benim de küçük bir şartım olacak
english: If you want to get what you want, I'll have a small condition.

text: Halime ve ailesi de o benim için
english: Halima and her family are for me.

text: Allah senden razı olsun Deli Demir

english: A man's trust is a man's glory
You trusted me in this room.

text: Halime de ailesi de bana emanet
english: I'll take care of Halima and her family.

text: yolun da bahtın da açık olsun
english: May your path be blessed and your fortune be blessed.
The whole burden of Kayi is on your shoulders

text: Ne başını eğ, ne de taşıyamayacağın yükün altına gir
english: Keep your head down, and don't go under the burden you can't carry.
May God make your way clear.
There's no going back, there's no going back
There's no turning, there's no seeing

text: Seni görmek için atımı hiç durmadan süreceğim
english: I'm going to ride my horse to see you all the time.
While you pay your father for his rebellion
Our young master has fallen into an embassy.

text: Esirler umurumda bile değil Kara Toygar
english: I don't care about the prisoners, Black Toygar.
They ran away on your land.
Give me the name of my brother's murderer.
You can't wait to be a hangman.

text: Dikkat et. Celladın ipine dolanma Kara Toygar
english: Careful, don't get caught in the hangman's rope, Black Toygar.

text: Kendi beceriksizliğini sakın bana yıkmaya çalışma
english: Don't try to pin your own incompetence on me.

text: Övündüğün şövalyelerin, birkaç kırık Alp'in hakkından gelemedi
english: The knights you bragged about couldn't get rid of a few broken Alps.

text: Onun ismini vermek için benden ne istiyorsun?
english: What do you want from me to name him?
I'll give you more than you want.
I'll put him in your hands

text: Bu bir alacak verecek meselesi değil Beni anlıyor musun?
english: This isn't about a loan, you know what I'm saying?
We don't give away the help we've been given.
Solomon is the son of the Shah.

text: şu baskılara bir de sen bak kızım. Gel
english: Take a look at these prints, girl.
You don't stop when you're not wanted.

text: Eğer sizde biraz ar varsa tez toplanıp gidin
english: If you have any leftovers, pack up and leave quickly.

text: Adettendir; misafire git denmez Herkes bu yüzden susar
english: It's customary; you don't tell a guest to go. That's why everyone shuts up.

text: böyle mi ödeyeceksiniz borcunuzu bu insanlara?
english: Is this how you repay these people?
Who gives you his bread, who gives you his tent

text: sizin yaranızı saran insanlara bunu mu reva görüyorsunuz?
english: Is that what you do to the people who wound you?

text: sen oynaş peşinde koşarken obada kan dökülecek, kan
english: Blood will be spilled in the oba while you're fooling around.
Go on, get out of here.

text: Duyması gereken şeyleri sen mi söylüyorsun?
english: Are you saying what he needs to hear?

text: Ben obanın dirliğini düşünüyorum. O kızın bunları çok evvel duyması gerekirdi
english: I think that girl should have heard it a long time ago.

text: Vah vah vah vah Bey kızı töre bilmez olmuş
english: Oh, dear, oh, dear. His daughter's a bit of a prude.

text: Atasının sözünün üzerine söz söyler olmuş
english: He speaks of his father's word.

text: Ezdiğini sandığın o taşların altında kalırsın sonra
english: You'll fall under those stones you think you've crushed
Ertuğrul is on his way in four Alps.
I'll take my revenge with my own hands
I'll never let that happen, Titus.
I'm in charge of this land.

text: Kendi sınırlarımda sadece ben güç kullanırım
english: I'm the only one who uses force on my own borders.

text: Bir haçlıyla ittifak yapıp kan döktüğüm duyulursa planımız bozulur
english: If word gets out that I made an alliance with a crusader and spilled blood, our plan is broken.

text: Bu adam kardeşimi öldürdü Kara Toygar
english: This man killed my brother, Black Toygar.

text: Onu senden canlı istiyorum Kendi ellerimle alacağım onun canını
english: I want him alive from you I'll take his life with my own hands

text: Sen hiç merak etme. Onu kurbanlık bir koç gibi bıçağına sunacağım
english: Don't worry, I'll give him to his knife like a sacrificial ram.
The Black Toygar is convinced, sir.

text: İyileşip, misafirlikleri bitene kadar bizden onlara göz kulak olmamızı istedi
english: He asked us to keep an eye on them until they're better and their stay is over.
Did you find out who they were?

text: Ser verdi, sır vermedi domuzun oğlu
english: Ser gave it to me, kept it a secret, the pig's son.
Now that you've got Big Seljuk freaked out,

text: belli ki bir kuyruk acıları var
english: They obviously have a tail pain.
It's up to us to take advantage of this opportunity.

text: Başka bir diyeceğin yoksa, yol yorgunusun Kurdoğlu. Git dinlen
english: If you don't have anything else to say, you're tired of the road, Kurdoglu.

text: Şu illet çıbandan kurtar beni Akçakoca
english: Save me from this diseased boil, white husband.
I think I'm going to die from this.

text: Beni her şeyden haberdar et Emrin olur beyim
english: Keep me informed. Your orders, sir.

text: Her vakit yaptığımız gibi, sığındığımız bir yerden kaçacağız. O kadar
english: We'll run away from a shelter like we always do, that's all.
I don't know what's on your mind.

text: Ama burayı senin için farklı kılan ne?
english: But what makes this place so different for you?

text: Bir şey mi var bana söylemediğin?
english: Is there something you're not telling me?
Let's go where no one can find us

text: Çölleri, denizleri aşalım ama gidelim baba Yeter ki gidelim
english: Let's cross the deserts, let's cross the seas, but let's go, Dad. Just let's go.

text: Ne oldu oğlum? Ne oldu Yiğit'im?
Baba bak; Deli Demir sen ve ablam için kılıç yapmış
english: Dad, look, Crazy Iron made a sword for you and my sister.

text: Buraların en iyi demircisidir o En iyi kılıçları o yapar
english: He's the best blacksmith around. He makes the best swords.
Ours is just to keep busy.

text: Sözü mü olur kızım? Ertuğrul Bey'imiz gitti ya
english: Don't mention it, my daughter, our Mr. Ertugrul is gone.
I wanted you to be thorough.
If you need anything, don't hesitate.

text: O yüzden onun ricasını kırmak olmaz
english: So you can't break his plea.

text: Ertuğrul'a söyle de atlar biraz dinlensin. Çatlayacak hayvanlar
english: Tell Ertugrul to let the horses rest for a while.

text: Onun aklı Halime'de. Obadan ayrılmadan ona yetişmek istiyor
english: Her mind is on Halima, she wants to catch up with him before he leaves Oba.
You tell me if you dare.

text: biz çatlasak olur da atlar çatlayacak
english: If we crack, the horses will crack.
Sir, can't we just catch our breath by the creek?

text: Şu aşağıda dinlenelim Gün doğmadan yola çıkarız
english: Let's rest down here. We'll leave before sunrise.
My head's on the line, sir.

text: Kim bilir hangi avcının elinden kaçarken bu hale düşmüş
english: Who knows which hunter got away from him and got himself this way?

text: Bu avını elinden kaçırdığına göre pek iyi bir avcı değilsin evlat
english: You're not much of a hunter now that you've lost your prey, son.

text: Ay güzel gözlüm... Bu koca yiğidin elinden kaçıp kurtuldun ha?
english: Oh, my beautiful eyes... you escaped from this great big man, huh?

text: Haydi bre bismillah Kısa zamanda sıhhatine kavuşasın
english: Let's get you well soon, God willing.
Where do you come from, where do you go?

text: Ha... Öyleyse hep gözünüz açık olsun
english: Ha... so keep your eyes open.

text: Kurda kuşa yem olmayın Buraların havası pusludur
english: Don't be eaten by a wolf. The air is misty around here.
Don't get lost in the powder.
Can you give me your name?

text: Eyerlerini samanlığın altına gömdüm Eyerleyip hemen yola çıkacağız
english: I've buried your saddles under the hay and we'll saddle up and be on our way.
Are you gonna be okay, Dad?

text: Yolun açık olsun Güneş tenini yakmasın
english: May the sun burn your skin
Don't let the rain get to you.

text: Ayağına taş değmesin. Su gibi git
english: Don't let a stone touch your feet.
Come back to me like water
No, she's thinking about my sister.
Don't talk to me like that.
We'll both get what we want.

text: Düşmanları küçük görmek, aptallara mahsustur Kara Toygar
english: It's for fools to look down on enemies, Black Toygar.

text: Deli Demir'i ben hallederim Siz işi sessizce bitirin
english: I'll take care of Crazy Iron. You guys do it quietly.
